bean.pwr.imskamieskiego.path_search

Class PathSearcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • bean.pwr.imskamieskiego.path_search.PathSearcher

  • public class PathSearcher
extends java.lang.Object
    PathSearcher is class which provide non-blocking executing of path search algorithms. For this reason, this class is suitable for use in the main thread. PathSearcher execute algorithms in separate thread and returns results via LiveData objects.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      PathSearcher(android.content.Context context)
      Create new instance of PathSearcher.

      Returns the resulting path as LiveData.
      boolean isInProgress()
      Returns the actual state of the search process.
      void startSearch(PathSearchAlgorithm algorithm)
      Starts search algorithm execution.This method is non-blocking, because search process starts in new thread.

        See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • startSearch

        public void startSearch(PathSearchAlgorithm algorithm)
                 throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Starts search algorithm execution.This method is non-blocking, because search process starts in new thread. PathSearcher can only do one search at a time. IllegalStateException will be thrown when attempting to run the search while the previous one has not been completed.
        Parameters:
        algorithm - Instance of algorithm used to path search.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - throw when previous search has not been completed

      • isInProgress

        public boolean isInProgress()
        Returns the actual state of the search process.
        Returns:
        returns true if the search is in progress, otherwise returns false

      • getPath

        public android.arch.lifecycle.LiveData<java.util.List<MapPoint>> getPath()
        Returns the resulting path as LiveData. When the search is complete, the LiveData objects will be updated.
        Returns:
        LiveData object representing the path of results
        See Also:
        LiveData
